channel.title: Please help about 508 client
channel.description: Hi, I was wondering is there a way to use a 317 server on a 508 client? Like the characters, objects, npcs etc 317...Just the client interface and stuff 508...I tried goin on a 508 client with a 317 server but when I log in it shows a black screen and disconnect me, please help.

item.title: Please help about 508 client
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Inside Dead Inside
item.description:
@Dead_Inside wrote:

Hi, I was wondering is there a way to use a 317 server on a 508 client?
Like the characters, objects, npcs etc 317…Just the client interface and stuff 508…I tried goin on a 508 client with a 317 server but when I log in it shows a black screen and disconnect me, please help.
